Global Variable# BNNSActivationFunctionRectifiedLinear

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOSwatchOS 3.0+

```
var BNNSActivationFunctionRectifiedLinear: BNNSActivationFunction
```
